DOC.brief_summary: A long-term study BAY77-1931 ( lanthanum carbonate ) hyperphosphatemia patient undergoing hemodialysis
DOC.brief_title: BAY 77-1931 Long-term Extension From Phase II Study
DOC.criteria: Undergoing hemodialysis 3 time per week chronic renal failure previous 3 consecutive month least Predialysis serum phosphate level 10.0mg/dL washout period
